items.title: Apple Music 音乐迁移工具现已在英国及其他7个国家推出，支持从Spotify等服务切换 (原标题: Apple Music Transfer Tool for Switching From Spotify Now Available in UK and 7 Other Countries)
items.creator: Tim Hardwick
items.summary:
## Apple Music 音乐迁移工具扩展至更多国家

Apple 已悄然将其音乐迁移工具的可用性扩展到更多国家，使用户能够将播放列表和音乐库从竞争对手的流媒体服务直接导入到 Apple Music。

### 主要功能与合作

*   **功能**：该工具允许用户将其保存的音乐、专辑和播放列表从 Spotify 等服务迁移到 Apple Music。
*   **合作**：此功能通过与 SongShift 合作实现。
*   **匹配机制**：Apple Music 会尝试匹配其目录中的歌曲，并标记那些未找到精确匹配的条目供用户审核。
*   **限制**：目前仅支持用户创建的播放列表迁移，服务自动生成的播放列表无法迁移。

### 可用性扩展

*   **初始发布**：该功能最初于2025年5月在澳大利亚和新西兰推出。
*   **最新扩展**：根据更新的 Apple 支持文档，该工具现已在巴西、加拿大、法国、德国、墨西哥和英国推出。
*   **总计**：目前，该工具已在包括澳大利亚和新西兰在内的8个国家/地区提供。
*   **未来展望**：此次扩展可能预示着 Apple 准备在未来几个月内将该工具推广到更多的国际市场。

### 如何使用

用户可以通过以下两种方式启动音乐迁移：

1.  **通过 iPhone/iPad 应用**：
    *   前往“设置”➝“应用”➝“音乐”➝“从其他音乐服务传输音乐”。
2.  **通过网页浏览器**：
    *   访问 [music.apple.com](https://music.apple.com)。
    *   登录您的 Apple 账户。
    *   点击右上角的个人资料图片，然后选择“传输音乐”。

![Apple Music](https://images.macrumors.com/t/jPqxfP3SYFgIgGrk4CnZ1nJ15M8=/400x0/article-new/2024/08/apple-music.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Apple Music 的音乐迁移工具已扩展至英国、巴西、加拿大、法国、德国、墨西哥等六个新国家，加上澳大利亚和新西兰，总计八个国家可用。该工具与 SongShift 合作，允许用户将 Spotify 等服务的播放列表和音乐库导入 Apple Music。用户可通过 Apple Music 应用或网页版进行操作，但仅支持用户创建的播放列表。此举预示着未来将有更广泛的国际推广。
items.translated_title: Apple Music 音乐迁移工具现已在英国及其他7个国家推出，支持从Spotify等服务切换
items.content:
Apple has quietly expanded availability of its music transfer tool to six additional countries, allowing users to import playlists and libraries from competing streaming services directly into Apple Music.


The feature initially launched in Australia and New Zealand in May 2025, and is now available in Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, Mexico, and the United Kingdom, according to an updated Apple Support document.

The transfer tool lets users migrate their saved music, albums, and playlists from services like Spotify through a partnership with SongShift. Users can initiate transfers through the Apple Music app on iPhone/iPad via the Music app settings menu (On iPhone, go to Settings ➝ Apps ➝ Music ➝ Transfer Music from Other Music Services).

If you don't see the above option, go to music.apple.com in your web browser, sign into your Apple Account, then click your profile picture in the top-right corner and select Transfer Music.

Apple Music attempts to match songs in its catalog, flagging items that need review when exact matches aren't found. Only user-created playlists can be transferred, not service-generated ones.

The expansion may indicate Apple is readying the tool for further international rollout in the coming months.
Tag: Apple Music

items.title: 从 iPhone 17 Air 到 iPhone 20：苹果的重新设计时间表 (原标题: From iPhone 17 Air to iPhone 20: Apple's Redesign Timeline)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# 苹果未来三年iPhone重新设计路线图

苹果公司计划在未来三年内对其iPhone设计进行彻底变革，最终在2027年iPhone 20周年之际推出一款“iPhone 20”，其设计将与现有型号截然不同。

![Beyond iPhone 13 Better Triad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BrVAcwQVscq-dmvsJeb3dR0JxrI=/400x0/article-new/2021/04/Beyond-iPhone-13-Better-Triad.jpg?lossy)

以下是未来几年的主要设计变化：

## 2025年：iPhone 17 Air

*   **首次亮相：** 苹果计划在2025年推出iPhone 17 Air，这将是一个显著更薄的iPhone版本。
*   **极致纤薄：** 传闻其厚度可能仅为5.5毫米，使其成为迄今为止最薄的iPhone。
*   **设计优先：** 苹果将优先考虑新的纤薄机身设计，这意味着在功能上会有一些妥协。
*   **功能妥协：**
    *   预计iPhone 17 Air将配备单镜头摄像头。
    *   由于需要使用更薄的电池，电池续航能力将有所降低。
*   **战略意义：** 尽管存在妥协，但这代表着全新的设计，标志着苹果向更纤薄智能手机迈进的第一步。

![iPhone 17 Air Colors Fanned Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Me6OOVAp2U-DXy9vs9qIk_yLJVk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/iPhone-17-Air-Colors-Fanned-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 2026年：首款可折叠iPhone

*   **历史性变革：** 首款可折叠iPhone将于2026年问世，这将是苹果智能手机产品线历史上最大的变化。
*   **折叠设计：**
    *   这款2026年的旗舰iPhone将像书本一样折叠。
    *   闭合时有一个外显示屏，打开时则是一个更大的内显示屏。
    *   苹果一直在努力减少折痕，旨在让可折叠iPhone在展开时看起来像一整块玻璃。
*   **显示屏尺寸：** 据分析师郭明錤称，可折叠iPhone将配备5.5英寸外显示屏和7.8英寸内显示屏。
*   **机身厚度：**
    *   展开时，它将比iPhone 17 Air更薄，厚度在4.5至4.8毫米之间。
    *   闭合时，厚度将在9至9.5毫米之间。
*   **功能妥协：**
    *   苹果将放弃Face ID，转而使用Touch ID进行身份验证。
    *   后置摄像头将限于双镜头设置，而非三镜头。
    *   将配备两个前置摄像头，以确保在打开和闭合状态下都有自拍功能。
*   **产品定位：** 可折叠iPhone将与更标准的iPhone 18型号一同销售。

![Apple Foldable Thumb](https://images.macrumors.com/t/WmYNENGA95YGRkAlvJXDrf2Vqko=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/Apple-Foldable-Thumb.jpg?lossy)

## 2027年：iPhone 20（20周年纪念版）

*   **周年庆典：** 为庆祝iPhone问世20周年，苹果有着宏伟的计划。
*   **革命性显示屏：** 苹果正在研发一款带有环绕式显示屏的iPhone，屏幕将环绕所有边缘，完全没有边框。
*   **一体化设计：**
    *   它将看起来像一整块玻璃，没有方形边缘，正面也没有任何开孔。
    *   这款20周年纪念版iPhone不会是可折叠设备。
*   **技术铺垫：** 苹果正在通过2025年和2026年的iPhone以及iOS 26中的全新“Liquid Glass”设计为这款全玻璃iPhone做准备。

![All Screen iPhone 2027 Feature 1](https://images.macrumors.com/t/DFDWw2pgXOS2YGSr4AJtUi6DONs=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/All-Screen-iPhone-2027-Feature-1.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果计划在未来三年内彻底革新iPhone设计。2025年将推出超薄的iPhone 17 Air，厚度仅5.5毫米，但会牺牲部分功能。2026年将发布首款可折叠iPhone，采用书本式折叠设计，内外双屏，展开时比iPhone 17 Air更薄，但将用Touch ID取代Face ID。2027年，为庆祝iPhone 20周年，将推出一款无边框、环绕式显示屏的“iPhone 20”，外观如同一整块玻璃。
items.translated_title: 从 iPhone 17 Air 到 iPhone 20：苹果的重新设计时间表
items.content:
Apple is planning to completely change the design of the iPhone over the course of the next three years, leading to a radically different "‌iPhone‌ 20" to celebrate the ‌iPhone‌'s 20th anniversary in 2027.


Here's what's coming.

2025


In 2025, Apple plans to debut the iPhone 17 Air, a much thinner version of the ‌iPhone‌. Rumors suggest that it could be as thin as 5.5mm, which would make it the thinnest ‌iPhone‌ to date.


Apple is prioritizing the new, slimmed down chassis over features, and there will be some compromises. The ‌iPhone 17 Air‌ is expected to have a single-lens camera and lower battery life because Apple has to use a thinner battery. Still, it is an all-new design, and it helps Apple start the move to slimmer smartphones.

2026


The first foldable ‌iPhone‌ is coming in 2026, and that will be the biggest change to Apple's smartphone lineup in ‌iPhone‌ history. Over the weekend, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman shared a few more details on the device, adding to what we already know.


Apple's 2026 flagship ‌iPhone‌ will fold like a book, featuring an outer display when closed and a larger interior display when open. Apple has been working to reduce the crease, so the foldable ‌iPhone‌ will look like a single piece of glass.

According to Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo, the foldable ‌iPhone‌ will have a 5.5-inch outer display and a 7.8-inch inner display. When it's unfolded, it'll be even thinner than the ‌iPhone 17 Air‌. It'll measure 4.5 to 4.8mm when open, and between 9 and 9.5mm when closed.

There will again be compromises, with Apple dropping Face ID and using Touch ID authentication instead. It will also be limited to a dual-lens rear camera, instead of a triple-lens setup, though there will be two front-facing cameras to make sure there's a selfie cam when it's open and when it's closed.

The foldable ‌iPhone‌ will be sold alongside more standard iPhone 18 models.

2027


For the ‌iPhone‌'s 20th anniversary in 2027, Apple has big plans. You might think that the 20th anniversary ‌iPhone‌ will be a foldable device, but that's not the plan.


Apple is working on an ‌iPhone‌ with a wraparound display that curves around all of the edges, so there will be no bezels at all. It will look like a single piece of glass, with no squared edges and no cutouts at the front.

Apple is preparing for the all-glass ‌iPhone‌ with the 2025 and 2026 iPhones, and with the new Liquid Glass design in iOS 26.

Which ‌iPhone‌ are you most looking forward to? Let us know in the comments below.

items.title: Apple发布iOS 26及更多产品的第五个公开测试版 (原标题: Apple Releases Fifth Public Betas of iOS 26 and More)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# Apple发布iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26和tvOS 26的第五个公开测试版

Apple于2025年8月25日发布了iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26和tvOS 26的第五个公开测试版，允许公众在9月正式发布前测试这些更新。此次发布距离第四个公开测试版仅一周，并且与当天早些时候发布的第八个开发者测试版相对应。

### 如何下载公开测试版
已在Apple网站注册的公开测试版用户可以通过以下步骤下载最新的‌iOS 26‌、‌iPadOS 26‌和macOS 26公开测试版：
1.  打开“设置”或“系统设置”应用。
2.  前往“通用”部分。
3.  轻点“软件更新”。
4.  选择‌iOS 26‌、‌iPadOS 26‌或macOS 26公开测试版选项。

### iOS 26和iPadOS 26主要新特性

*   **Liquid Glass设计语言**
    *   ‌iOS 26‌和‌iPadOS 26‌采用了Apple的“液态玻璃”设计，视觉美学专注于透明度。
    *   图标、菜单按钮、导航栏等通过微妙的动画反射和折射光线。
    *   部分区域有弹出式菜单，标签栏会缩小，整体外观更加圆润。
    *   ![iOS 26 Liquid Glass锁屏](https://images.macrumors.com/t/7wiLciB8sm7AZvv6y0i5B91ykJk=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-liquid-glass-lock-screen-beta-6.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![三部iPhone上的iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/T-wXm4YuRC1oaKVIYmUjg3V5ETg=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-on-Three-iPhones.jpg?lossy)

*   **Apple Intelligence功能**
    *   针对截图的“视觉智能”（Visual Intelligence）。
    *   钱包应用中更新的订单跟踪功能。
    *   提醒事项应用中的新功能。
    *   信息、电话和FaceTime应用中的实时翻译（Live Translation）。
    *   Image Playground支持ChatGPT风格的选项。
    *   Genmoji支持混合两个或更多表情符号以创建新内容。
    *   ![十个信息功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/9XJY2LSI3OigERIuYd5UE2uE5jo=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/ten-messages-features.jpg?lossy)

*   **其他核心应用更新**
    *   **照片：** 2D照片通过“空间场景”（Spatial Scene）功能呈现出更具3D感的外观。
    *   **Safari：** 导航功能得到更新。
    *   **电话应用：** 新增“通话筛选”（Call Screening）和“保持辅助”（Hold Assist）功能，旨在节省用户时间。
        *   ![iOS 26通话保持](https://images.macrumors.com/t/QtMxGxFPwsU6Mk7q8bN8eKo-Fek=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/ios-26-call-holding.jpg?lossy)
    *   **信息应用：** 支持自定义背景和投票功能。
    *   **Apple Music：** 引入了类似DJ的“自动混音”（AutoMix）功能。
    *   **CarPlay：** 界面进行了全面改造。
    *   **新应用：** 新增“Apple游戏”（Apple Games）应用。
    *   **预览（Preview）：** 首次登陆iPhone。

### macOS Tahoe主要新特性

*   **Liquid Glass设计语言**
    *   macOS Tahoe与‌iOS 26‌采用了相同的“液态玻璃”设计。
    *   这一设计扩展到应用图标、文件夹、Dock、应用内导航、菜单、控制中心和菜单栏。
    *   ![macOS Tahoe设计](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EdGtm3e2IgVilW3lAR4kmfeM2fs=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/macos-tahoe-design.jpg?lossy)

*   **系统和应用更新**
    *   **自定义：** 控制中心和菜单栏可自定义，用户还可以自定义文件夹、应用图标和小组件。
    *   **Safari：** 更新了标签页设计和重新设计的侧边栏。
    *   **电话应用：** 电话应用首次登陆Mac，支持通过Wi-Fi通话进行电话呼叫，并支持新的“通话筛选”和“保持辅助”功能。
    *   **Spotlight：** 进行了全面改进，搜索功能更强大，并且能够执行数百项操作而无需打开应用。
    *   **游戏应用：** 新增游戏应用，并带有“游戏叠加”（Game Overlay）功能。
    *   **开发者工具：** 开发者可访问Metal 4。

### 展望
此次发布的第五个公开测试版很可能是‌iOS 26‌在发布候选版本和正式发布版本之前的最后一个公开测试版。
items.shortSummary: Apple发布了iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS 26和tvOS 26的第五个公开测试版，这是9月正式发布前的关键一步。这些更新引入了“液态玻璃”设计语言，并带来了多项新功能，包括Apple Intelligence、电话应用的通话筛选和保持辅助、信息应用的自定义背景和投票、macOS上的电话应用、以及Spotlight的重大改进。此次发布很可能是正式版前的最后一个公开测试版。
items.translated_title: Apple发布iOS 26及更多产品的第五个公开测试版

images.alt: ios 26 liquid glass lock screen beta 6

items.content:
Apple today released the fifth public betas of iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS 26, and tvOS 26, allowing the public to test the updates ahead of their September launch. The fifth public betas come a week after the fourth public betas, and the updates correspond with the eighth developer betas that were released earlier today.


Public beta testers that have registered on Apple's website can download the latest ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, and macOS 26 public betas by opening the Settings or System Settings app, going to the General section, tapping on Software Update, and choosing the ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, or macOS 26 Public Beta options.

‌iOS 26‌ and ‌iPadOS 26‌ feature Apple's Liquid Glass design, with a visual aesthetic that focuses on transparency. Icons, menu buttons, navigation bars, and more reflect and refract light with subtle animations. There are pop-out menus in some areas, tab bars shrink down, and everything has a more rounded look.


There are new Apple Intelligence features like Visual Intelligence for screenshots, updated order tracking in the Wallet app, new features in Reminders, and Live Translation for the Messages, Phone, and FaceTime apps. Image Playground has ChatGPT style options, and Genmoji supports mixing two or more emoji characters to make something new.


2D photos have a more 3D look with a Spatial Scene feature, and Safari has updated navigation. In the Phone app, there are new Call Screening and Hold Assist features that will save you time, while the Messages app supports customizable backgrounds and polls. Apple Music has a DJ-like AutoMix feature, CarPlay has an overhauled interface, there's a new Apple Games app, and Preview has come to the iPhone for the first time.


macOS Tahoe has the same Liquid Glass design as ‌iOS 26‌, and it extends to app icons, folders, the Dock, in-app navigation, menus, the Control Center, and the Menu Bar. The Control Center and the Menu Bar are customizable, and you're also able to customize folders, app icons, and widgets.


Safari has an updated tab design and a redesigned sidebar, and Apple has brought the Phone app to the Mac for making phone calls through Wi-Fi Calling. The Phone app supports the new Call Screening and Hold Assist features.

Spotlight has been overhauled with improved search and the ability to execute hundreds of actions without opening up an app. There's a new Games app with a Game Overlay feature, and developers have access to Metal 4.

More on what's new can be found in our iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe roundups. This is likely to be the final public beta of ‌iOS 26‌ before the release candidate and the launch version.

items.title: 苹果发布iOS 26 Beta 8后，测试工作可能已接近尾声 (原标题: iOS 26 Beta Testing Likely Complete After Apple Seeds Beta 8)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26 Beta 测试进展：发布Beta 8，正式版临近

苹果已向开发者发布了iOS 26的第八个测试版（Beta 8），这强烈预示着iOS 26的测试工作即将完成。根据苹果过往的发布模式，通常会在发布八个开发者测试版后推出最终的软件版本。

## 历史模式与当前进展

*   **常规测试周期：** 苹果在iOS 18、iOS 17、iOS 16、iOS 15、iOS 14和iOS 13等版本中，均未超出八个测试版。
*   **例外情况：** 唯一的例外是2018年的iOS 12，该版本曾发布过多达十二个测试版。然而，此后没有其他iOS版本在9月发布前进行如此频繁的更新。
*   **时间线相似性：** iOS 26 Beta 8于8月25日发布，与iOS 18 Beta 8在8月28日发布的时机相似，进一步印证了测试周期接近尾声的推测。
*   **当前焦点：** 尽管苹果仍有可能根据需要发布额外的测试版以解决重大错误，但目前软件工程师的重点很可能已转向准备iOS 26的发布候选版（Release Candidate, RC）。
*   **Beta 8变化：** iOS 26 Beta 8中未发现重大功能变化。

![iOS 26 功能](https://images.macrumors.com/t/EGeEJZAFMuH0j2ywenSgydx6r-w=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/iOS-26-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 预计发布时间表

*   **发布候选版（RC）：** iOS 26的最终发布候选版预计将在9月的iPhone发布会后提供。
*   **iPhone发布会：** 传闻称今年的iPhone发布会将于9月9日举行，届时iOS 26的RC版可能同步推出。
*   **iOS 26正式版：** iOS的正式发布通常在新iPhone机型上市前几天。根据iPhone预购（可能在9月12日）和正式上市（可能在9月19日）的推测，iOS 26的公众发布时间预计将在9月15日至9月17日之间。
*   **其他操作系统：** 在iPhone发布会当天，iPadOS 26、macOS Tahoe、tvOS 26、visionOS 26和watchOS 26的发布候选版也预计将同步推出，在此之前不会有额外的测试版。
items.shortSummary: 苹果已发布iOS 26 Beta 8，预示着测试工作即将完成。根据历史模式，苹果通常在发布八个测试版后推出最终版本。预计iOS 26的发布候选版（RC）将在9月9日的iPhone发布会后提供，而正式版则可能在9月15日至17日之间向公众推出。其他操作系统如iPadOS 26等也将同步发布RC版。
items.translated_title: 苹果发布iOS 26 Beta 8后，测试工作可能已接近尾声
items.content:
Apple today provided developers with iOS 26 beta 8, which means that beta testing is likely coming to an end. Apple typically only seeds eight developer betas of an iOS update before the software gets a final launch.


Apple did not go beyond eight betas for iOS 18, iOS 17, iOS 16, iOS 15, iOS 14, or iOS 13. Way back in 2018, iOS 12 did have a ninth beta, a tenth beta, an eleventh beta, and a twelfth beta, but no other new versions of iOS have been updated as frequently ahead of a planned September launch date.

With ‌iOS 18‌, Apple released the eighth beta on August 28, and there were no subsequent betas. Since the eighth ‌iOS 26‌ beta came on August 25, the timing is similar.

Apple could always deviate from its testing cycle and throw in another beta if there are still major bugs to be worked out, but Apple software engineers are likely focused on getting the ‌iOS 26‌ release candidate ready. There were no major changes found in the eighth beta of ‌iOS 26‌, and we are still waiting on the final public beta.

Ahead of when ‌iOS 26‌ sees an official launch in September, Apple will provide a finalized release candidate as the last testing step. If Apple follows its past pattern, we'll get the release candidate for ‌iOS 26‌ just after the September iPhone event.

Rumors suggest Apple will hold this year's ‌iPhone‌ event on September 9, so the release candidate would be made available on that date. iOS launches typically happen a few days before new ‌iPhone‌ models come out. Apple often holds ‌iPhone‌ pre-orders on the Friday after an event, and then the next Friday is the official launch date. So ‌iPhone‌ pre-orders will likely be on September 12, with a launch on September 19. With that timeline, ‌iOS 26‌ will launch to the public sometime between September 15 and September 17.

We are also not expecting to see any additional betas of iPadOS 26, macOS Tahoe, tvOS 26, visionOS 26, and watchOS 26 before the release candidates come out on ‌iPhone‌ event day.

# 苹果为阻止用户取消订阅，提供Apple TV+两个月54折优惠

苹果公司正采取措施，通过提供折扣来挽留其Apple TV+订阅用户，以应对用户取消订阅的意图。

## 优惠详情

*   **折扣触发机制**：当用户尝试取消Apple TV+订阅时，系统可能会弹出一个优惠窗口。
*   **折扣内容**：该优惠将Apple TV+的月费降至5.99美元，持续两个月。
*   **恢复原价**：两个月后，订阅费用将恢复到每月12.99美元的原价。
*   **优惠背景**：此举可能旨在应对Apple TV+近期在美国将月费上调至12.99美元后，部分用户因价格上涨而选择取消订阅的情况。

## 其他订阅选项

*   **年度订阅**：用户仍可选择99美元的年度订阅，以获得更低的平均月费。
*   **Apple One 套餐**：Apple One捆绑套餐的价格保持不变。

## 用户建议

*   如果用户希望享受5.99美元的优惠，但不打算继续支付12.99美元的原价，应确保在支付第二个5.99美元月费后取消订阅。
*   例如，如果今天选择此优惠，12.99美元的原价将在11月恢复。

items.content:
Apple is aiming to keep Apple TV+ subscribers from canceling, offering a discounted subscription when customers threaten to stop paying.


If you cancel your ‌Apple TV‌+ subscription, you may see a pop-up that drops the price of ‌Apple TV‌+ to $5.99 for the next two months, before the $12.99 per month cost resumes. Apple appears to have started offering the discount in the last few days.

Apple recently increased the price of ‌Apple TV‌+ to $12.99 per month in the United States, so the offer for a temporarily discounted subscription may be aimed at those who are canceling their subscriptions due to the price hike.

Apple is still charging $99 for an annual subscription, so there is an option to get a lower price when subscribing for a full year. Apple also has not changed the price of its Apple One bundles.

Customers who want to get the $5.99 deal without continuing to pay $12.99 should make sure to cancel after the second $5.99 monthly charge. Opting in to the discounted offer today would mean the $12.99 price would resume in November.
